definition: "knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
to abridge (a text)/to edit out (of a movie)/to cut back (a budget, a curriculum)
to abridge/to cut a text down to size for publication
to cut (from a movie etc)/to censor

sentences.english: Chinese website please use Chinese, lock, then delete.
sentences.chinese: 中文网站请使用中文，锁，然后删。

sentences.english: The other procedures done to perfect some, in some places, not really deleted.
sentences.chinese: 另外一方面程序要做得完美一些，有些地方真不能删。

sentences.english: Dear webmaster, my English message mentioned-above is not inaccurate at all. Why did you delete it?
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的吧主，额上述英文帖并不反动，为何要删哦？

sentences.english: Want cutout , it is cutout is sordid.
Want cutout , it is cutout is sordid.
If nobody needs, I'll delete files in 3 days.
sentences.chinese: 如果没人要了，三天内删档案啰。

sentences.english: Then, pay attention to the blue word nickname, is already deleted your friends.
sentences.chinese: 接着，注意蓝字昵称，就是已经删你好友的人。

sentences.english: An approach for estimation of undeletable measurements with gross errors(MGEs) is proposed based on temporal redundancy information.
sentences.chinese: 提出基于时间冗余的不可删显著误差处理方法。

definition: to add sb to one's blacklist (on a cellphone, or in instant messaging software etc)/abbr. for 拉到黑名單|拉到黑名单
Moments (social networking function of smartphone app WeChat 微信[Wei1 xin4])
"zombie fans", fake followers that can be bought to boost one's popularity on Weibo, Baidu etc
to use an image without permission
to break off relations/to break with sb
to sticky (an Internet forum thread etc)
to reply to an invitation/(Internet) to post a comment on a forum topic
private correspondence/personal letter/(computing) personal message (PM)/to message sb
